name: Breakout SAE
description:
This game has been created during the "2022 SAE Bochum Studyweek".
Choose one of the six characters, try to break through the barrier and watch your opponent blead >;)

Controls:

  • Vertical Movement: W/S or UP/DOWN Arrow keys (left stick on controller)
  • Horizontal Movement: A/D or LEFT/RIGHT Arrow keys (left stick on controller)
  • Shoot: Space/Enter(Return) (A on Xbox Controller)
